text: Tarin (also written as Tareen), are a large Pashtun tribe. They mostly live in parts of Pakistan and Afghanistan.Gankovsky, Y (1964) The Peoples of Pakistan:An Ethnic Study Lahore: Progressive Publishers Ltd, p.11 The Durrani tribe, which ruled Afghanistan for quite some time, is a branch descended from the main Tarin tribe.RTI Ridgway, The Pathans 1911 ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in Afghanistan Category:Ethnic groups in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Ethnic groups in Balochistan (Pakistan)
title: Tarin
